alert.note: Alert for DuPage; Grundy; Kane; Kendall; Northern Will; Southern Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 26 at 9:24PM CDT until May 27 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Illinois, including the following areas, DuPage, Grundy, Kane, Kendall, Northern Will and Southern Will. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flood Watch for flash flooding means rapid-onset flooding is possible, but not yet certain, based upon the latest forecasts. Flash flooding is a dangerous situation. Persons with interests along area rivers, creeks, and other waterways should monitor the latest forecasts and be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: DuPage; Grundy; Kane; Kendall; Northern Will; Southern Will
